abstract: Donald J. Trump responds to questions about a 1927 report in The New York Times that listed his father as among those arrested in response to a Ku Klux Klan rally that had turned violent in Queens

headline.main: In Interview, Donald Trump Denies Report of Father’s Arrest in 1927

snippet: Donald J. Trump responds to questions about a 1927 report in The New York Times that listed his father as among those arrested in response to a Ku Klux Klan rally that had turned violent in Queens
